lead_paragraph: The Islamic State took responsibility on Friday for car bombings that struck two luxury hotels in Baghdad, which a security official said had killed 14 people.

headline.main: Iraq: 14 Are Killed in Hotel Bombings
headline.print_headline: Iraq: 14 Are Killed in Hotel Bombings

snippet: The Islamic State took responsibility on Friday for car bombings that struck two luxury hotels in Baghdad, which a security official said had killed 14 people.
